outfit_data.top: A blush pink silk blouse with delicate ruffle detailing at the neckline and long, billowing sleeves that gracefully drape to the elbows.
outfit_data.bottom: Flowing lavender chiffon midi skirt with a subtle A-line silhouette and an asymmetrical hem that falls slightly longer in the back.
outfit_data.shoes: Strappy silver satin heels with a pointed toe and a stiletto heel.
outfit_data.extras: Delicate pearl earrings, a matching lavender silk clutch bag, and a light mint linen blazer for a touch of sophistication when entering cooler environments.
